pages.text: The $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() of Divination searches the earth for the specific block under the center glyph (that is under the block it is attached on).$(br2)It will not give away the exact position, just the count.$(br2)When searching for those blocks, keep in mind that the radius of this $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is limited to a chunk $(l:bewitchment:creatures/cat)Under Normal Conditions$().
